item.title: security: Microsoft named a Leader in IDC MarketScape for Unified AI Governance Platforms
item.description:
Microsoft was named a Leader in the 2025-2026 IDC MarketScape for Unified AI Governance Platforms, recognizing the company’s commitment to making AI innovation safe, responsible, and enterprise-ready, according to the Microsoft Security Blog.

  • Source: Microsoft Security Blog

item.title: ai: Introducing Multi-Agent Workflows in Foundry Agent Service
item.description:
Microsoft Foundry introduces Multi-Agent Workflows in the Foundry Agent Service to help organizations move beyond single-purpose agents toward orchestrated, multi-step, role-based AI processes that include stronger governance and operational dependability for enterprise use.

  • Source: Microsoft AI Foundry Blog

item.title: ai: Assess Agentic Risks with the AI Red Teaming Agent in Microsoft Foundry
item.description:
Microsoft Foundry now offers major public-preview enhancements for models and agentic AI pipelines, including an AI Red Teaming Agent that helps organizations proactively identify and mitigate safety and security risks in models and agentic systems before they enter production.

  • Source: Microsoft AI Foundry Blog

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Govern Model Context Protocol (MCP) endpoints using Azure API Management
item.description:
Azure API Management (APIM) now generally supports governance for Model Context Protocol (MCP) endpoints. The GA release brings APIM’s governance, security, and observability capabilities to AI-driven workloads, enabling enterprises to manage and monitor MCP endpoints through existing APIM controls.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Streamline IT governance, security, and cost management experiences with Microsoft Foundry
item.description:
Microsoft Foundry’s enterprise features are now generally available, providing IT administrators tools to streamline AI development and management while enforcing enterprise-grade security, compliance, governance, and cost controls.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Enterprise AI controls & the agent control plane are in public preview
item.description:
GitHub announced an enterprise-level experience for administrative functions for AI systems called the agent control plane, now available in public preview to all GitHub Enterprise Cloud customers using Copilot.

  • Source: GitHub
